Analysis package release process

Notes on manually releasing an analysis package for future automation.

Prior to release:

  • Update release notes (NEWS.md) [TODO: verify and extract version and release notes using release script]
  • Add new notebooks to README.md [TODO: generate list of files in analysis using R code]
  • Merge all changes to main

Creating a release (0.7.1):

  1. Create release branch
  2. Update Version field in DESCRIPTION to 0.7.1
  3. Commit: GitHub release 0.7.1
  4. Run build_analysis_site()
  5. Commit: build_analysis_site() for release 0.7.1
  6. Open Pull Request [TODO: include release notes]
  7. Rebase and merge
  8. Delete branch
  9. Publish new GitHub release. Name: 0.7.1, Title: 0.7.1, Target commit: build_analysis_site() for release 0.7.1, Description: blank [TODO: use release notes]

Analysis package creation process

Notes on manually creating an analysis package for future automation.

  1. Use available::available() to check package name
  2. Create repo on GitHub - Add README, .gitignore (R), MIT License
  3. Configure repo - enable pages (main, root/), enable Dependabot (Security & analysis), branch protection for main: require pull request, status checks, linear history
  4. Run usethis::create_from_github() outside the project, commit changes
  5. Run usethis::create_package() outside the project, commit changes
  6. Run renv::init() inside the project, commit changes
  7. Run usethis::use_mit_license(), do not overwrite
  8. Edit DESCRIPTION and add a Title and Description
  9. Run usethis::use_github_links()
  10. Add Add GitHub pages URL to DESCRIPTION
  11. Run usethis::use_package("devtools", type = "Suggests")
  12. Run renv::install("jabenninghoff/rdev"), usethis::use_dev_package("rdev", type = "Suggests")
  13. Add lines to .Rprofile per below
  14. Create .lintr: linters: with_defaults(line_length_linter(100))
  15. Run usethis::use_news_md()
  16. Create TODO.md per below
  17. Create R/package.R per below
  18. Run usethis::use_readme_rmd(), copy README from template, run usethis::use_readme_rmd()
  19. Create analysis directories: $ mkdir analysis; cd analysis; mkdir assets data import rendered, update .gitignore
  20. Run usethis::use_testthat()
  21. Create pkgdown/_base.yml with url: <github-pages-url>
  22. Run usethis::use_build_ignore(c(".github", ".lintr", "analysis", "docs", "pkgdown", "TODO.md")), sort_rbuildignore()
  23. Run devtools::document()
  24. Run rdev::style_all(), rdev::lint_all(), rdev::ci() to validate package
  25. Create first Notebook, run build_analysis_site() to validate build
  26. Run renv::snapshot()
  27. Install .github workflows
  28. Create 1.0.0 release

.Rprofile

Add the following lines to the project .Rprofile:

# attach devtools and set options per https://r-pkgs.org/setup.html
if (interactive()) {
  suppressMessages(require(devtools))
  suppressMessages(require(rdev))
}

#' @keywords internal
